book.synopsis: In Left Behind, the novel that began the popular series, readers are exposed to a dramatic and terrifying interpretation of what might occur when Christians are suddenly removed from the earth. The book sheds light on the intensity and importance of this end-times topic. In this new Bible study based on Left Behind, readers will delve into the biblical truth behind this fictional account of the Rapture to develop a deeper understanding of the biblical Rapture.
